column2: An apple is a round fruit with smooth green, yellow, or red skin and firm white flesh.
Bananas are long curved fruit with yellow skins.
Cherries are small, round fruit with red skins.
A computer is an electronic machine that can store and deal with large amounts of information.
Development is the gradual growth or formation of something.
A graduate is a person who has successfully completed a degree at a university or college and has received a certificate that shows this.
An alphabet is a set of letters usually presented in a fixed order which is used for writing the words of a particular language or group of languages.
